summary: Now all traps are more dangerous...so be careful!
descriptionHtml:
Now all traps are more dangerous...so be careful!

NOTE: The trap damage depends by the level of the player, and is contained on the limits shown below...

==DARTS===
New damage: about 2 - 8 for 3 seconds for each dart.

==FLAMES/ FROSTBITE/ SPARKS TRAPS===
New damage: about 10 - 35 for second

===FIRE BOLT/ ICE SPIKE/ LIGHTNING BOLT===
New damage: about 30 - 55 for hit

==FIRE BALL/ ICE STORM/ LIGHTING CHAIN===
New damage: about 40 - 90 for hit (fire ball: 30 - 55 for 2 seconds for each hit)

==FIRE/ FROST/ SHOCK RUNES===
New damage: about 30 - 55 for rune.

==FLAMING OIL SPOT===
New damage: about 15 - 40 for 3 seconds.

****UPDATE 1.1*****
New damage for bear traps
Fixed a serious bug for the duration of the "Slowness" effect of frost traps

****UPDATE 1.2*****
Corrected some minors issues

****UPDATE 1.3*****
Corrected some minor issues.
author: alfx3
